prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body character design, a young man standing center on pure white background, anime style, Japanese animation aesthetic, vibrant colors, no text / no symbols / no garbled characters / no words.

He is an exceptionally handsome young man with a comedic and slightly awkward charm. His face is perfectly proportioned with delicate, refined features: a sharp jawline, high cheekbones, and flawless, fair skin. His eyes are large, expressive, and bright, sparkling with a mix of naive optimism and occasional dazed confusion. His eyebrows are neatly shaped. He has a straight, elegant nose and soft, well-defined lips that naturally curve into a dazzling, photogenic smile, though it sometimes appears a bit forced or distracted. His expression is predominantly cheerful and approachable, but can shift to momentary bewilderment or exaggerated surprise, fitting the humorous tone.

His hair is stylish and eye-catching, with medium-length, slightly tousled locks in a vibrant shade of anime-style blue or silver. The hairstyle is dynamic, with a few artful strands falling across his forehead. He wears casual, slightly aspirational but affordable clothing suitable for a rookie actor in a comedic world: a well-fitted, pastel-colored (like light blue or mint green) short-sleeved shirt made of soft cotton, paired with slim-fit beige or gray chinos. Over this, he might wear a lightweight, unzipped hoodie in a complementary color. The outfit is neat but not overly formal, suggesting his attempt to look presentable for auditions while remaining comfortable for pratfalls. His posture is upright but not rigid, with a slight lean or an open-handed gesture that hints at his readiness for both performance and unintentional mishaps. The overall design emphasizes his high颜值 through精致五官 and英俊面容, while his slightly goofy potential and the cartoonish, exaggerated style align perfectly with the荒诞喜剧 and轻松诙谐 game基调., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: anime
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
